channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fallen down tree / branches partially blocking road, 9th December
item.description:
Opposite 142 Farmfield Road. Came down in the heavy windows last night

From walkway to bus shelter.

item.title: Pothole as you go round from Lansdown Road towards Andover Road, 8th December
item.description:
Pothole in middle of carriageway. The curve makes it hard to avoid completely - if you avoid it with your front wheels, the rear wheels catch it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole series of potholes in Crescent Terrace outside Yates', 8th December
item.description:
Whole series of potholes in carriageway, very uneven. Disproportionally affects blue badge holders because this is the only way to access the spaces on the Prom.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain in pavement, 8th December
item.description:
Blocked drain in pavement behind bus stop outside 37b. Floods entire pavement when it rains, making it hard to get to bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Uneven pavement, weds growing in pavement, 8th December
item.description:
The pavement to the right of 2 Kentmere Close as you face the home. The pavement is unsafe for me to use my frame or wheelchair. I am disabled and have limited mobility. However, I do try and get outdoors for a short walk if I can. It is not safe for me.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Keswick Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Downpipe drain under pavement has rotted and isnt draining away. the pipe needs replacing as there is no fall on it, 8th December
item.description:
Immediately to the right of the door of 78 north street in winchcombe

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes, patches and eroded roadway, 8th December
item.description:
It is to the right of 2 Kentmere Close as you face the home. There are a number of elderly and disabled in the community, including me. I have a painful nerve condition that is exacerbated by rough roads and bumps. The pavement amd road make it impossible for me to use my frame or wheelchair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Keswick Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Controlled crossing button not working. Around button lights up after being pressed but then disappears without stopping traffic, 8th December
item.description:
Pedestrian crossing of A40 heading towards Gloucester, just after Benhall roundabout. All pedestrian crossing buttons
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole, 8th December
item.description:
Huge pothole which appears to have been here for some time. This is a fast road (upto 60mph) and without daylight this pot hole cannot be seen, causing significant damage to tyres.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large are of deteriorating road surface, significant series of very deep holes and uneven surface, very dangerous, cars slowing to a crawl and swerving to avoid. seriously dangerous for cyclists., 8th December
item.description:
Where the road widens, you really can't miss it! The road has been like this for months and is getting worse all the time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Considerable danger provoking pothole, 8th December
item.description:
